*“Enthusiasm”* - a Near-based corporate system for team motivation and inspiration.
 Enthusiasm provides a set of tools that help to maintain team motivation and promote the power of small actions within a team. 
*_Rewards_*
 This functionality helps to thank any of the teammates in your Slack workspace by sending them some amount of Near tokens. 
*_Award nomination_*
This functionality provides the ability to nominate any teammate for a reward at the end of a working period (sprint/month/year). Nomination represents some titles like *_'The most valuable player'_*, *_'Soul of a Team'_* etc, and the number of the Near protocol tokens as a monetary reward. Teammates can vote for their nominees with the help of the Near blockchain, which makes this process completely easy and transparent
